mapper.select: SELECT T2.ID , T2.CUSTOMER_ID , T2.RECEIVED_AT , T2.DEVICE_REPORTED_TIME , T2.FACILITY , T2.PRIORITY , T2.FROM_HOST , T2.MESSAGE , T2.NT_SEVERITY , T2.IMPORTANCE , T2.EVENT_SOURCE , T2.EVENT_USER , T2.EVENT_CATEGORY , T2.EVENT_ID , T2.EVENT_BINARY_DATA , T2.MAX_AVAILABLE , T2.CURR_USAGE , T2.MIN_USAGE , T2.MAX_USAGE , T2.INFO_UNIT_ID , T2.SYS_LOG_TAG , T2.EVENT_LOG_TYPE , T2.GENERIC_FILE_NAME , T2.SYSTEM_ID FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(T1 SYSTEM_EVENTS_PK) */ ROWNUM RN , T1.* FROM (SELECT * FROM DEV.SYSTEM_EVENTS ) T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{_skiprows} + #{_pagesize} ) T2 WHERE T2.RN > #{_skiprows}

SELECT ID , CUSTOMER_ID , RECEIVED_AT , DEVICE_REPORTED_TIME , FACILITY , PRIORITY , FROM_HOST , MESSAGE , NT_SEVERITY , IMPORTANCE , EVENT_SOURCE , EVENT_USER , EVENT_CATEGORY , EVENT_ID , EVENT_BINARY_DATA , MAX_AVAILABLE , CURR_USAGE , MIN_USAGE , MAX_USAGE , INFO_UNIT_ID , SYS_LOG_TAG , EVENT_LOG_TYPE , GENERIC_FILE_NAME , SYSTEM_ID FROM DEV.SYSTEM_EVENTS_PK WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID = #{id}
SELECT /*+ INDEX_FFS(T1 SYSTEM_EVENTS_PK) */ count(*) COUNT FROM DEV.SYSTEM_EVENTS T1
mapper.update: UPDATE DEV.SYSTEM_EVENTS SET UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser} , UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DEV.SYSTEM_EVENTS WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID = #{id}
